=== अनुराग पटेल (Anurag Patel) ===

Hi, I am अनुराग पटेल (Anurag Patel), a free software enthusiast and Ubuntu user. I'm located in Mumbai - India. My areas of interest include designing web based applications. I believe in the power of internet and its related side effects, like FreeSoftware culture, collaboration sans frontiers.
